mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.firstweight AS "firstweight", a.continueweight AS "continueweight", a.firstprice AS "firstprice", a.continueprice AS "continueprice", a.icon AS "icon", a.description AS "description", a.defaultdeliverycorp AS "defaultdeliverycorp.id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.orders AS "orders"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shipping_method( id, name, firstweight, continueweight, firstprice, continueprice, icon, description, defaultdeliverycorp, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, orders ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{firstweight}, #{continueweight}, #{firstprice}, #{continueprice}, #{icon}, #{description}, #{defaultdeliverycorp.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{orders} )
mapper.update: UPDATE shipping_method SET name = #{name}, firstweight = #{firstweight}, continueweight = #{continueweight}, firstprice = #{firstprice}, continueprice = #{continueprice}, icon = #{icon}, description = #{description}, defaultdeliverycorp = #{defaultdeliverycorp.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, orders = #{orders} WHERE id = #{id}
